definitions.definition: A soft, moist mass, usually wrapped in cloth and warmed, that is applied topically to a sore, aching or lesioned part of the body to soothe it.
A porous solid filled with solvent , used to remove stains from porous stone such as marble or granite.

main_definition: A soft, moist mass, usually wrapped in cloth and warmed, that is applied topically to a sore, aching or lesioned part of the body to soothe it.
secondary_definitions: A porous solid filled with solvent , used to remove stains from porous stone such as marble or granite.
